sense.def:
Kadar živali in rastline
evolve
, se postopno spreminjajo in razvijajo v drugačne oblike ali vrste.

seg.quote: The earliest fish have evolved into some 30,000 different species.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
evolves
, se postopno razvije iz nečesa preprostejšega.

seg.quote: It was fascinating to see how the film evolved.
How did Giotto evolve his very personal and original style?
